mapper.select: select ib.BOARD_NO, ib.BOARD_TITLE, ib.BOARD_DATE, u.NAME, ib.ANS_YN from Inq_Board ib join `USER` u where ib.BOARD_USER = u.USER_NO and ib.DEL_YN = '1' and ib.ANS_YN != '4' order by ib.BOARD_DATE DESC, ib.ANS_YN, ib.BOARD_NO DESC
mapper.insert: insert into Inq_Board(BOARD_USER, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT) values ((select USER_NO from USER where USERNAME = #{username}), #{board_title}, #{board_content})
mapper.select: select ib.BOARD_NO, ib.BOARD_BF_NO, ib.BOARD_ANS_NO, ib.BOARD_USER, ib.BOARD_TITLE, ib.BOARD_CONTENT, ib.BOARD_DATE, ib.ANS_YN, ib.FILE_NO, u.NAME from Inq_Board ib join USER u on ib.BOARD_USER = u.USER_NO where BOARD_NO = #{no} and DEL_YN = '1'
mapper.update: update Inq_Board set DEL_YN = "2" where BOARD_NO = #{board_no}
